intro.title: Introduction
intro.desc:
Hotel Basment

By: Genna Hennessy and Peter Gagliardi

It was a dark and stormy night. You approach the basement of a hotel. Why, you can't say.

When suddenly...

basement_door.title: Basement Door
basement_door.desc:
You hear festive music coming from the hotel basement. It seems odd to you, for this hotel is abandoned.

You also wonder why you are in an abandoned hotel anyway. And why is it always a dark and stormy night?

You stop breaking the fourth wall and decide to open the door.

basement.title: The Basement
basement.desc:
You enter the basement. It's so dark. Good thing you brought a flashlight!

Do you turn on your flashlight? Or are you feeling brave today?

ouch.title: Ouch!
ouch.desc:
You hit your head on a low-hanging pipe walking down the stairs in the dark. You begin to regret your life's decisions.

You decide to turn on the flashlight to save yourself another headache

basement_lights.title: The Basement (Now with light!)
basement_lights.desc:
You find yourself in the basement of the hotel. There is festive music coming from a different room

There are many wooden chairs in one corner, probably set aside for special events. One chair lies broken a few feet from the other chairs.

Near to the corner of the room with the stairs, there is a loose floorboard

In the corner diagonally across from the chairs, there is a cart of cleaning supplies

In the last corner, there are various pipes along the wall.

There is a door in the wall between the chairs and the pipes

cleaning_supplies.title: Cleaning Supplies
cleaning_supplies.desc: There's a bunch of cleaning supplies... Including a mop! You think it may come in handy, so you take it with you.

floorboard.title: Loose Floorboard
floorboard.desc: under the loose floorboard, you find a quarter and a lot of dust.

sit.title: Sit Down
sit.desc:
You sit down in one of the chairs.

...This was pointless.

broken_chair.title: Broken Chair
broken_chair.desc: The chair has a broken leg. You figure the broken leg might be useful to  defend yourself, so you take it.

pipes.title: Pipes
pipes.desc: You inspect the pipes. There's nothing interesting to see here.

big_room.title: Big Room
big_room.desc:
You are in a big room with many doors. The music is getting louder.

On the left wall, there are two doors. The closer one just has a doorknob, the other one has a keyhole

On the far wall, there is a single door marked "Laundry"

On the the right wall, there are again two doors. The closer one has a numeric keypad. The farther one is unmarked

Other than this, the room is empty.

security_room.title: Security Room
security_room.desc:
You unlock the door. It looks like a security room; there are many monitors with video footage.

You notice that the video on every screen is paused to look at a single person. You.

fan_room.title: Fan Room
fan_room.desc: You are in a room. A huge exhaust fan is in the far wall. You hear something banging against the metal. There's a key in the bottom of the fan's casing,  but the fan is too fast to safely grab it.

other_room.title: Room
other_room.desc: It's a nondescript room. It's almost as if the author forgot to finis--

locked_room.title: (Previously) Locked Room
locked_room.desc:
You open the locked door with the key. It's a mostly empty room, except for a vintage gramophone that is playing the music you heard earlier.

However, something doesn't seem right about the gramophone...

gramophone.title: Gramophone
gramophone.desc:
You look closer at the gramophone. The festive music is playing... but there's no record being played!

You try to turn off the gramophone... but it won't stop.

You ponder what might be the real source of the sound, when suddenly...

continued.title: To be Continued...
continued.desc:
Suddenly, you are surrounded in darkness. Someone threw a burlap sack over you and is now carrying you away...

TO BE CONTINUED...

laundry_room.title: Laundry Room
laundry_room.desc: You enter the laundry room. There is a soda machine in the corner. There are washers and driers everywhere. There is another unmarked door in the corner.

fan.title: Fan
fan.desc: You jam the chair leg into the fan. It stops the fan in place long enough that you can grab the key without having your hand sliced open.

washing_machine.title: Washing Machines
washing_machine.desc: You go through each washer and drier. You find a few quarters. You are now $0.75 richer!

soda_machine.title: Soda Machine
soda_machine.desc:
You insert a dollar into the vending machine. It spits out a soda.

As you drink the soda, you notice something printed on the inside of the cap. It says:

SECRET CODE: 15335
